thread.title: Lionel Richie to launch Las Vegas residency next year
thread.title_full: Lionel Richie to launch Las Vegas residency next year

title: Lionel Richie to launch Las Vegas residency next year
text: Final defendant in state fair stage collapse suit dismissed. NEW YORK (AP) -- Lionel Richie is ready to go all night long in Las Vegas. The singer announced Wednesday that he will launch a residency called "Lionel Richie - All the Hits" on April 27 at The AXIS at Planet Hollywood Resort & Casino. Richie will play 20 shows in April, May, September and October. Tickets, which go on sale Friday, range from $59 to $199, not including service charges. The shows will include hits such as "All Night Long (All Night)," `'Hello," `'Stuck on You," `'Say You, Say Me" and "Dancing on the Ceiling." Richie said in a statement: "It's a high energy show that is a perfect match for such a vibrant city!" ---
